entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@RandPaul @NYGovCuomo You're the biggest joke in the Senate. 
John McCain nailed you to the floor, outing you for what you are, a Russian @$$et, Putin's puppet. 
You ignored your colleagues health after a positive COVID-19 test. No wonder your neighbor put you in the hospital.
#BlueStatesFundRedStates
